---
title: "__init__"
description: "Initialize an AgentsClient instance"
---

Configures the client to use the "agents" endpoint path and sets optional API key and server URL for authentication and server configuration. The initial state has no recorded agent response


## Parameters

<ParamField path="api_key" type="UnionType[str, None]">
  Optional API key for authenticating requests. (default: None)
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="server_url" type="UnionType[str, None]">
   (default: None)
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="verbose" type="bool">
   (default: False)
</ParamField>
